text: hey what's up guys rev here i'm not
gonna lie this video contains some
pretty disappointing developments the
kind where a game's official art contest
disqualified one of its legitimate
winners because a bunch of antis
complain about the artist's previous
artwork that had absolutely nothing to
do with the competition so this
controversy stems from the survival
horror game identity v a game developed
in china with a sizable english and
japanese player base and about a month
ago the official english account for the
franchise held an art contest accepting
submissions from north american european
and southeast asian artists for a
summer-themed illustration based on the
game's characters well fast forward to a
few days ago here's a screenshot of the
now deleted original post announcing the
winners of the art contest a post that
included a silver reward for a piece
submitted by the artist hahi underscore
haas
now not wanting to repost their
submission without the artist's
permission i can attest that the artwork
is completely safe for work and quite
good by any reasonable standard aka a
rightful winner however after the first
announcement of the contest winners
there was a whole slew of antis mostly
children complaining to identity v that
this artist was a full-fledged pedophile
posting cp and pro-ship content on their
twitter account they're proof of these
serious claims well you guessed it it's
the supposedly problematic artwork
featured on this artist's account in
particular shoticon and pro-shift
artwork featuring characters from the
identity v franchise ironically for
artwork they claimed was illegal some
still felt comfortable downloading and
publicly sharing its uncensored versions
with a game's english account in an
attempt to get this artist disqualified
from the competition well guess what
guys we got the bad ending because
identity v's english account deleted
their original tweet and reposted the
arc contest results this time removing
the rifle winner haki underscore haas
who won fair and square because after
all there was not a single rule in the
ark contest forbidding the type of art
they submitted and there were certainly
no rules barring artists from the
competition based on their previous
artwork that had absolutely nothing to
do with their submission for the
competition not only did the cowards of
this english twitter account cave to the
outrage their actions encourage the
continued harassment and defamation of
the artist involved including everything
from false accusations to targeted
harassment to even people trying to get
the artist account banned from the game
as well
obviously this whole thing is
embarrassing to see the fact that this
company acted in such a reactionary
fashion to completely ridiculous claims
was enough to eliminate any chance for
many people to even want to bother
trying out this game not only do they
rob this artist of an achievement they
earned fair and square they actively
incentivize people on a public platform
to turn to outrage whenever they're
upset about something they're telling
these people it's okay to slander and
harass artists if their content makes
them uncomfy an absolutely terrible look
for this company and of course feel free
to support the artists they did all this
too but that's gonna do it for this
video hope you all enjoyed and i'll see
you guys next time
